name: Expansion: Capital Ships/Crews in Epic Space Online
blurb: We're adding a new aspect to this MMO set in an Infinite Universe -- "Capital Ships" -- crewed by you and your mates.

rewards.reward: BETA Access to the game + an Advanced Scout Ship. Available instantly. Join the game now and fly "The Falcon". A faster and more maneuverable scout ship. Has extra cargo space and an on board scanner. Perfect for deep space exploration and relic hunting. Everything you need to explore an Infinite Universe at an Early Bird Special.

BETA Access to the game + an Advanced Scout Ship. Available instantly. Join the game now and fly "The Falcon". A faster and more maneuverable scout ship. Has extra cargo space and an on board scanner. Perfect for deep space exploration and relic hunting. Everything you need to explore an Infinite Universe.
STARTER PACK: Get into the game now with three free ships. The Falcon, The Artemis, and the Vulture! If you're already a player you'll receive all the above plus a promotion in rank.

SPACE STATION PACK + BETA Access: Get into the game now with all the ships above plus a free space station. Space Stations allow you to legally own sectors of space as well as produce and sell in game items. If you're already a player you'll receive all the above plus a promotion in rank.

CAPITAL SHIPS EARLY BIRD: You get the Armored Transport Ship showcased in the video. Early adopters get this capital ship at a lower rate. All tiers above included. You will be able to walk around on this ship with others, and fly it anywhere in the shared universe.

CAPITAL SHIP PACK: You get the Armored Transport Ship showcased in the video. All tiers above included. You will be able to walk around on this ship with others, and fly it anywhere in the shared universe.

CAPITAL SHIP PACK x2: Same as above, you just get two of them. Comes with an extra beta key. Feel free to give the ship to a friend. Comes with two Space Station Packs, all smaller ships included. Basically two separate packages designed for two players.

CARRIER CAPITAL SHIP: The Odin. This Carrier Class Capital Ship comes equipped with a hangar bay and the ability to use prototype jump drives. A very rare and lethal warship designed to project sovereignty over a large part of the galaxy.  Use it for commerce, exploration, or combat. All tiers above minus the Destroyer below included.

NEW TIER!! DESTROYER CAPITAL SHIP + CARRIER: The Karatsu. Designed to be the damage dealer capital ship class. The most powerful ship in Epic Space Online. Also comes with jump drives. Suitable for exploration or combat. The only ship with extremely long range sensors. (A range of 10 sectors.) All tiers above PLUS the Carrier included. Give it to a friend, or keep it for yourself. Eligible for the Ship Replacement Program. Also get BETA Access to the ESO Industry Professional Mobile App. Keep an eye on your empire when you're Away from Keyboard.

NEW TIER!! The Aequitas Class Kickstarter Exclusive Corvette. We'll name the ship after YOU. More details on this ship on Project Update #3. Note: All Pledge Tiers will already receive the exclusive ship as a Thank You. This pledge level allows us to name the ship after you, or a name of your choosing.

VIP: Fighter Design + E3 Launch Party\r\n============================== \r\nHelp us create the look and feel of one of the ESO Fighter Ships. You choose the role, weapons, the name, back story and more. We'll assist with the design. You'll receive the VIP Award (Listed in the Credits as such, given the in game VIP icon and Forum Badge.) Invite to the ESO Launch Party in Los Angeles during E3 2014 on Tuesday, June 10th. All awards minus the Aequitas naming are included.

VIP: Capital Design + E3 Launch Party\r\n============================== \r\nHelp us create the look and feel of one of the ESO Capital Ships. You choose the role, weapons, the name, back story and more. We'll assist with the design. You'll receive the VIP Award (Listed in the Credits as such, given the in game VIP icon and Forum Badge.) Invite to the ESO Launch Party in Los Angeles during E3 2014 on Tuesday, June 10th. All awards minus the Aequitas naming are included.

VIP: NPC Likeness + E3 Launch Party\r\n============================== \r\nWe'll add your likeness as one of the main NPC characters players interact with in game. A permanent place in ESO lore. You'll receive the VIP Award (Listed in the Credits as such, given the in game VIP icon and Forum Badge.) Invite to the ESO Launch Party in Los Angeles during E3 2014 on Tuesday, June 10th. All awards minus the Aequitas naming included.

VIP: The Odin + E3 Launch Party\r\n============================== \r\nYou'll also receive the only signed 3D Model of the Odin. There will only be one of these designed, not even the developers will have one. Includes a certificate of authenticity. You'll receive the VIP Award (Listed in the Credits as such, given the in game VIP icon and Forum Badge.) Invite to the ESO Launch Party in Los Angeles during E3 2014 on Tuesday, June 10th. All awards minus the Aquitas naming and other VIP tiers are included.
An option to be a Keynote speaker at SCIFiCon. http://SCIFiCon.net. Denver Colorado, or any of our other upcoming venues.
